article_title: Lancaster General Health moves closer to joining Penn Medicine
article_text: Heather Stauffer covers the health care industry. She can be reached at hstauffer@lnpnews.com or 717-481-6022.

article_metadata.author: HEATHER STAUFFER | Staff Writer

og.description: Within weeks, Lancaster County's largest health system may have a final agreement to become part of a much bigger one based in Philadelphia.
og.title: Lancaster General Health moves closer to joining Penn Medicine
